sections.title: Turn Vision Into an Executable Roadmap
sections.subtitle: Draft a lean business plan that keeps investors, teammates, and customers aligned

sections.title: What You'll Produce
items: A concise one-page business plan with mission, market, and metrics
SMART targets for the first 12 months of operation
A cost structure and revenue model summary
A milestone timeline with owners and checkpoints

sections.title: Keep It Lean but Insightful
sections.content: Investors scan for clarity. Outline the customer, the problem, your solution, and the unfair advantage you bring. Focus on evidence gathered during validation rather than assumptions.

points.title: Market Summary
points.description: Size, growth rate, and key trends proving the opportunity is worth chasing.

points.title: Go-to-Market
points.description: How you will reach and convert early adopters within budget.

points.title: Financial Snapshot
points.description: Projected revenue, costs, gross margin, and break-even timeline in a simple table.

sections.title: Update Quarterly
sections.content: Schedule a 90-day review to refresh assumptions, celebrate wins, and adjust targets before drift sets in.

sections.title: Plan Sprint Worksheet
steps: Write a 2-sentence mission statement that names the customer and outcome.
Capture top three customer segments with estimated market size.
List the main revenue streams and the cost to deliver each.
Draft a 12-month milestone timeline including MVP launch, first 50 customers, and break-even point.
Share the plan with a mentor or advisor and log their feedback for iteration.

sections.title: Visuals Win Trust
